titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the disposition of a firearm to, and the possession of a firearm by, non-permanent resident aliens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 7/27/2001--Introduced. Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to prohibit the disposition of a firearm to, or the possession of a firearm by, anyone who is not lawfully admitted for permanent residence in the United States.
